sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import {useHistory} from "react-router-dom" import axios from 'axios' function ViewProfile() { let userID = "" const [user, setUser] = useState("") useEffect(() => { userID = localStorage.getItem("DASS_USERID") axios.get('http://localhost:4000/user/' + userID) .then(response => { console.log(response.data) setUser(response.data) }) const history = useHistory(); const handleClick = () => { history.push("/home") } }, []) return (

PROFILE DETAILS

Username {user.username}
Email {user.email}
Address {user.address}
Phone {user.phone}
Type {user.type}
) } export default ViewProfile
